question: What is the name of the Indigenously Developed Anti Radiation Missile, tested by DRDO?
explanation:
Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) conducted a successful test of the New Generation Anti Radiation Missile (NGRAM) called the Rudram-1.
The missile has been tested at the Integrated Test Range (ITR) in Balasore. This is Indiaâ€™s first indigenous anti-radiation missile and it would be launched from various fighter aircraft used by the Indian Air Force.
